# React In-depth

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/react-in-depth
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/react-in-depth
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install react-in-depth
react-in-depth <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g react-in-depth
react-in-depth <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
